variable.name: Sample Type
variable.description: Indicates the Tumor / Normal status of a sample

variable.name: Tissue Site
variable.description: General body site where sample was collected

variable.name: Tumor Percent
variable.description: Estimated percent of nucleated cells that consist of tumor cells (determined by BSP if tissue sample QC'd, but may be provided by collaborator on samples BSP does not review)

variable.name: Cancer Stage
variable.description: Stage of Cancer as appropriate for cancer type

variable.name: Tumor Type
variable.description: Sample taken from Primary or Secondary/Metastatic tumor

variable.name: BSP Notes
variable.description: Comments on tissue from BSP path. Review or additional notes submitted by the collaborator

variable.name: Fibroblast and Vessel Percent
variable.description: Estimated percent of nucleated cells that consist of fibroblasts and vessels (determined by BSP if tissue sample QC'd, but may be provided by collaborator on samples BSP does not review)

variable.name: Inflammation Percent
variable.description: Estimated percent of nucleated cells that consist of inflammatory cells (determined by BSP if tissue sample QC'd, but may be provided by collaborator on samples BSP does not review)

variable.name: Necrosis Percent
variable.description: Estimated percent of the tissue specimen that is necrotic (relative indicator of specimen quality)
